Tabs.corporateGroupStructureOrganizationalStr: Corporate Group Structure and Organizational Structure

Slogan.title: This is what we believe in as a leading port operator, the operational approach of Sathai Terminal, and our commitment to our customers and partners.

Vision.content: This is what we believe in as a leading port operator, the operational approach of Sathai Terminal, and our commitment to our customers and partners.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be a leader in providing integrated logistics services with innovative solutions that truly meet customer needs.

missionToCustomers.title: Mission to Customers
missionToCustomers.content: “Create value for customers with modern solutions and efficient services.”

missionToShareholders.title: Mission to Shareholders
missionToShareholders.content: “Create value for shareholders with sustainable growth and standardized management.”

missionToEmployees.title: Mission to Employees
missionToEmployees.content: “Create a good work environment, promote skill development, and encourage career advancement.”

missionToSociety.title: Mission to Society
missionToSociety.content: “Help, support, and demonstrate responsibility toward society and the environment.”

openness.title: OPENNESS
openness.content: Open to new ideas and change.

CommitmentSuccess.content: Sahathai Terminal is a private company that began operations in 2007. The company has a total operational area of 315,200 square meters, including a container maintenance area, a customs office within the port area, and full-service port handling equipment, along with skilled and expert personnel. Sathai Terminal is located along the Chao Phraya River, offering comprehensive services to customers. You can trust that we have complete solutions and supplementary services to meet every need. All of our services are certified by global standards, while we are also able to offer flexible services, which only independent port operators can provide.

2558.title: Expanded the new dock
2558.content: Expanded the new dock with MOL under the name 'Bangkok Barge Terminal' or BBT.

2559_2560.title: Launched container shipping services by water
2559_2560.content: Launched container shipping services by water using coastal cargo vessels through Bangkok Barge Service.

2560_2562.content4: Formed a joint venture company to invest in two projects (international cargo port / distribution center).

2568.content: We will be the leader in providing integrated and sustainable logistics services, focusing on port services, maritime and road transportation, warehousing, distribution centers, and other value-added services for our customers.

BoardAndExecutives.content: Sathai Terminal places great importance on internal communication within the organization. We value personnel at all levels and promote smooth collaboration across all parties. Supervisors work closely with the personnel under their care, from sales to skill development. We highly emphasize equality within the organization to ensure that all our employees understand and recognize their value to the organization. This ensures that everyone shares a common goal, which is to perform and deliver services that best meet our customers' needs.

auditCommittee.title: Audit Committee
auditCommittee.content:
Our Audit Committee is responsible for overseeing the operations of our management board within the company, particularly in the areas of financial reporting and information.
The members of the Audit Committee are as follows:
Ms. Wilai¹ Chattantarat, Chairman of the Audit Committee
Mr. Yut Worachatthan, Audit Committee Member
Mr. Witit Leenutpong, Audit Committee Member
In addition, the company has established an internal audit office under the Audit Committee and has hired an external agency, Thammaniti Internal Audit Company, to conduct internal audits.
Note:
1. The director is knowledgeable and experienced in accounting.
2. The company has considered the qualifications of independent directors and audit committee members according to the Securities and Exchange Commission's definition.

organizationalStructure.title: Organizational Structure
organizationalStructure.content: The diagram below illustrates our organizational structure as of November 10, 2023. The Board of Directors of Sathai Terminal Public Company Limited consists of the Risk Management, Corporate Governance, and Sustainability Committee, the Audit Committee, the Executive Committee, and the Nomination and Remuneration Committee.
